crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'onbill' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {id: doc._id, name: doc.name}); }

daily_fees.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'debit' || doc.pvt_reason != 'daily_fee' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {id: doc._id, name: doc.name}); }

one_time_fees.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'debit' || doc.pvt_reason == 'daily_fee' || doc.pvt_reason == 'per_minute_call' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {id: doc._id, name: doc.name}); }

per_minute_call.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_ledger_type != 'debit' || doc.source.service != 'per-minute-voip' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {id: doc._id, cost: doc.amount, duration: doc.usage.quantity, name: doc.name, amount: doc.pvt_amount, from: doc.metadata.caller_id_number, to: doc.metadata.callee_id_number, rate: doc.metadata.rate.value, rate_name: doc.metadata.rate.name, rate_increment: doc.metadata.rate.increment, rate_minimum: doc.metadata.rate.minimum }); }
